channel.title: Disconnecting 1 error [help]
channel.description:
I would be verry happy if you would help me on this one i have a lot of npc and alot of people on my server but the thing thats drawing them away is the unnessasarly diconnects from this error [code]Error: jamie size mismatch in getnpcpos - pos:206 psize:195 Error: T2 - 65,81,65 - 195,3486,3493 - 24,-1,-1,-1,-1,-1,-1,-1,-1,-1,0,18,-24,19,-28,0,91,-92,79,-112,-36,22,-31,17,67,-116,29,68,21,14,52,
[/code]
this is off moparscape client could anyone please help me stop dicconeting out of random??
